reviews.text:
My wife and I wanted Italian as we celebrated our wedding anniversary today. We decided on this restaurant and we are very glad we did! 

The food was...
Great service. The server was quick tending to us and checking in occasionally. The food was really good! So much on the menu and the prices are very...

First, make a reservation. 

Second, get the bruschetta. 

Everything was wonderful and tasted spot on.  I had feels like I was sitting in my grandma's...
